body: Ogres are like onions. They’ve got layers to them, different personalities inside
Bittersweet ending
I CAME TO FAP NOT TO FEEL 😢
Ogre #1 https://nhentai.net/g/248924/ Ogre #2 https://nhentai.net/g/190217/ Ogre #3 https://nhentai.net/g/216511/

btw, i kind of remember a story which had pretty much similar setup to this. but, instead of an orge, it features an orc iirc. and the girls didnt die, but they switched bodies instead. i guess to some people, this one i mentioned perhaps might be harsher.

i think her elder sister did died taken by that orge. when consuming her, the orge itself perhaps consumed the girls will, thus making him thinking that he is still the female knight. i think most orges dont have things like thoughts here, they seems to be only following orders from that least intelligent one.
looking back this sounds and seems like it could be an easy Isekai in recent times

Redbrownalgae is right. It's like NTR where the people in the wrong get what's coming to them at the end. There was undeniably an awful feeling and experience, but at least you can get a good justice boner out of it at the end.
Fusion all over again with strength boost from the ogre on top of that she dual wields both of those sisters weapons that light sword and heavy sword
Such a weird story

Well I wouldn't say it was sweet so much as it was cathartic, knowing that they managed to overtake the ogre's personalities with their own before opening a can of whoopass on the other ogre's. Could have ended much worse.
quick question the hell is snuff?
At least it have a good ending.

so sweet cant fap
too heartwarming

Hm so she ended up consuming her sister, but they still managed to suppress the ogre's control and go on to defeat other ogres. Definitely could've ended worse. Though I did want to see another chapter where they kill the mage ogre.

It's just their personality and memories that live on. They all got eaten alive.
